original_text: Joseph is as strong as a bull. He has horns like a wild ox. Those two horns are the armies of Ephraim and Manasseh! 33: Ephraim and Manasseh were Joseph's two sons. They each became separate tribes. With them, he attacks other nations. He chases them to the edges of the world. Joseph is as strong as a bull. He has horns like a wild ox. Those two horns are the armies of Ephraim and Manasseh! 33: Ephraim and Manasseh were Joseph's two sons. They each became separate tribes. With them, he attacks other nations. He chases them to the edges of the world. Joseph is as strong as a bull. He has horns like a wild ox. Those two horns are the armies of Ephraim and Manasseh! 33: Ephraim and Manasseh were Joseph's two sons. They each became separate tribes. With them, he attacks other nations. He chases them to the edges of the world. Joseph is as strong as a bull. He has horns like a wild ox. Those two horns are the armies of Ephraim and Manasseh! 33: Ephraim and Manasseh were Joseph's two sons. They each became separate tribes. With them, he attacks other nations. He chases them to the edges of the world. Joseph is as strong as a bull. He has horns like a wild ox. Those two horns are the armies of Ephraim and Manasseh! 33: Ephraim and Manasseh were Joseph's two sons. They each became separate tribes. With them, he attacks other nations. He chases them to the edges of the world. Joseph is as strong as a bull.
korean_text: 그는 첫 수송아지 같이 위엄이 있으니 그 뿔이 들소의 뿔 같도다 이것으로 민족들을 받아 땅 끝까지 이르리니 곧 에브라임의 자손은 만만이요 므낫세의 자손은 천천이리로다

sentences.original_text: Joseph is as strong as a bull.
He has horns like a wild ox.
Those two horns are the armies of Ephraim and Manasseh!
sentences.korean_translation: 그 두 뿔은 에브라임과 므낫세의 군대입니다!

sentences.original_text: Ephraim and Manasseh were Joseph's two sons.
They each became separate tribes.
With them, he attacks other nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 그는 다른 나라들을 공격합니다.
